annual_mpg_per_vehicle: LETNO PREVOŽENIH MILJ NA GALONO PO VOZILU
annual_kpl_per_vehicle: LETNO PREVOŽENIH KILOMETROV NA LITER PO VOZILU
tire_price_explanation: Vnesite nadomestno ceno za pnevmatike, in sicer posebej za krmilne, pogonske in tovorne pnevmatike. Zakaj je to potrebno: brez cene pnevmatik ne moremo izračunati vaših letnih stroškov pnevmatik in vaših prihrankov.
tire_runout_miles_explanation: V ustrezna spodnja polja vnesite število prevoženih milj, preden je prišlo do obrabe pnevmatik.  Kako določimo število milj do obrabe pnevmatik: merimo število prevoženih milj od namestitve do odstranitve pnevmatik. Število milj do obrabe pnevmatik je potrebno za izračun stroška na miljo. Ko pa izračunamo vaš letni strošek na miljo, bodo v povzetku predstavljeni grafični povzetki, ki bodo omogočili lažjo predstavo vpliva prevoženih milj na obrabo in letne stroške pnevmatik.
tire_runout_kilometers_explantion: V ustrezna spodnja polja vnesite število prevoženih kilometrov, preden je prišlo do obrabe pnevmatik.  Kako določimo število kilometrov do obrabe pnevmatik: merimo število prevoženih kilometrov od namestitve do odstranitve pnevmatik. Število kilometrov do obrabe pnevmatik je potrebno za izračun stroška na kilometer. Ko pa izračunamo vaš letni strošek na kilometer, bodo v povzetku predstavljeni grafični povzetki, ki bodo omogočili lažjo predstavo vpliva prevoženih kilometrov na obrabo in letne stroške pnevmatik.
first _life_explanation: Primerjajte trenutne pnevmatike s predlaganim kompletom pnevmatik.
second_life_explantion: Če kliknete na zavihek z drugo življenjsko dobo, boste lahko pretehtali odločitev o drugi življenjski dobi pnevmatik, vključno z njihovo obnovo. Zavihek z drugo življenjsko dobo vam lahko koristi, če v svojem poslu uporabljate nove pnevmatike in obnovljene pnevmatike.
blended_average_explanation: Prilagodite svoje rezultate z uporabo zavihka s kombiniranim povprečjem. Zavihek s kombiniranim povprečjem vam omogoča, da prilagodite simulacijo na podlagi kombinacije simulacij prve in druge življenjske dobe. Po zaključku simulacij prve in druge življenjske dobe bo kombinacija 50 %/50 % postala privzeta vrednost, vendar je ta rezultat mogoče preprosto spremeniti, da ustreza vašemu poslu.
weight_savings_explanation: Če v konfiguraciji prve življenjske dobe izberete pnevmatike MICHELIN X One, vas bo vprašalo, če želite izračunati morebitne prihranke pri teži.  Prosili vas bomo, da navedete še nekaj podrobnosti o svojem tovoru, saj boste tako pridobili prilagojen pogled možnih vplivov povečanega koristnega tovora in povečanega prihodka.  Zavihek s prihranki pri teži je izbirni zavihek in vam ga ni treba izbrati za dokončanje simulacije.
rolling_explanation: Za vašo konfiguracijo trenutnih pnevmatik bo osnovni kotalni upor vedno znašal 100. Osnovna meritev z vrednostjo 100 služi kot referenca za vsako pnevmatiko in konfiguracijo celotnega vozila.
weight_savings_page_explanation: Vas zanima, koliko koristnega tovora lahko prevažate s pnevmatikami MICHELIN X One? Navedite še nekaj podrobnosti za izračun morebitnih prihrankov pri teži in pridobite oceno dodatnih prihodkov ob prevažanju večje količine koristnega tovora.
additional_revenue_weight_savings: Želite izračunati dodatne prihodke iz prihrankov pri teži?
cost_savings: MOREBITNI NAJVEČJI LETNI PRIHRANEK STROŠKOV GORIVA IN PNEVMATIK

potential_weight_savings_after_retrofit: Morebitni prihranki pri teži po naknadni namestitvi

second_life_runout_mile: Primerjava prevoženih milj do obrabe pri drugi življenjski dobi

graph_page_alert: Preglejte strani z grafikoni, preden odprete stran za vnos podatkov.
graph_page_go_overall_pages_alert: Preglejte vse strani z grafikoni, preden odprete stran za vnos podatkov.
complete_page_alert: Pred nadaljevanjem dokončajte izpolnjevanje na strani
complete_scenario_alert: Scenarij dokončajte, preden boste dodali novega
scenario_incomplete_alert: Ta scenarij je nepopoln. Dokončajte ga ali zavrzite.
fuel_tire_costs_proposed_tires: Fuel & Tire Annual Costs: Proposed Tires
name: Name
regional_urban_val: Long Haul, Regional and Urban value sum is 100
config_text: The fuel and mileage savings calculations shown are estimates for comparison purposes only. Rolling resistance numbers are determined using drum tests according to ISO 28580 procedures. Actual fuel consumption and mileage performance will vary due to factors such as air pressure maintenance, vehicle components, driver techniques, climate and road conditions and aerodynamics. For more information, see your Michelin Truck Tire Representative.
annual_averageload_truck: ANNUAL AVERAGE LOAD OF THE TRUCK (T)
email_incorrect: One or more email addresses are invalid
fuel_report_attached: Fuel and Mileage report is attached
addtional_email_input: Please enter any additional recipients’ e-Mail Ids (separated by ;):
quantity_of_fuel_saving_with_michelin_ti: QUANTITY OF FUEL SAVING WITH MICHELIN TIRES
annual_fuel_bill_label: = fleet size trucks x current price of fuel x (annual (kilo meter (or) miles) per vehicle x annual (mpg miles per gallon (or) l/100km) per vehicle) /100)
note_label: Percentage (%) Fuel Savings with Michelin Tires: to be a user input field, with a validation rule of 20%
potential_fuel_saveing_label: = Annual Fuel Billx Percentage Fuel Savings with Michelin Tires
rolling_note: Note: Current total rolling resistance always be 100,-->Rolling Resistance
proposed_rolling_resistance_text: =Steer Tread RRx100x(numb steer value/numb of total tire) + Drive Tread RRx100x(numb drive value/numb of total tire) + Tire Tread RR x100x(numb tire value/numb of total tire) + Non driven RR x100x(numb non-driven value/numb of total tire)
current_tire_fuel_consume_text: = annual miles per vehicle x (annual mpg per vehicle / 100)
current_tire_fuel_consume_fleet: Current Tire fuel consumed whole Fleet
current_tire_fuel_consume_fleet_text: = current Tire Fuel Consumed x fleet size trucks
coefficient_fuel_consumption_text: = (Annual Km/100) x(l/ 100 km consumption - ((proposed RR – current RR) x this. Total RR Coe) x (Annual average load of truck x temp COE))
proposed_fuel_consumption_text: =Proposed Fuel Consumption Fleet = coefficient Fuel Consumption x fleet size trucks
fuel_cost_text: = Tire fuel consumed whole Fleet x price of fuel
tyre_cost_text1: = {(Steer Tire Price/Steer Runout km)xSteer Tire NumberxAnnual Km)
tyre_cost_text2: (Drive Tire Price/Drive Runout km)xDrive Tire NumberxAnnual Km) }
tyre_cost_text3: Fleet Size Trucks + ( Trailer Tire Price/Trailer Runout km)
tyre_cost_text5: Non-Driven Tire Price/Non-Driven Runout km)xNon-Driven Tire NumberxAnnual Km)
fuel_tire_cost: Fuel and Tire Annual Costs Whole Fleet
rr_label_text: =Steer RR Value x(Steer Tires/Total Tires) + Drive RR Valuex(Drive Tires/Total Tires) + Non-Driven RR Valuex(Non-Driven Tires/Total Tires) + Trailer RR Valuex(Trailer Tires/Total Tires)
fuel_consume_text: Proposed Fuel Consumed – Current Fuel Consumed
fuel_cost1_text: Proposed Fuel Cost – Current Fuel Cost
tire_cost1_text: Proposed Tire Cost– Current Tire Cost
tire_cost1_text1: Gap1 Tire Cost / Current Tire Cost x 100%

legalVariable: The fuel and mileage saving calculations shown are based on identified average values. Rolling resistance figures are determined by drum tests according to ISO 28580 procedures. Actual fuel consumption and mileage will vary due to factors such as air pressure maintenance, vehicle components, driver techniques, climate and road conditions and aerodynamics. For more information, please contact your Michelin representative.
